/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. A few birds can be seen flying in the distance, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. In the center of the image, a small building with a red roof stands out, its color contrasting with the surrounding greenery and the blue sky. This building, possibly a local landmark, adds a touch of human presence to the landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and the building. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the tranquil beauty of everyday life in Beijing.
